alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clay; Oktibbeha; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:57AM CDT until April 05 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN CHOCTAW...NORTHWESTERN OKTIBBEHA...WEBSTER AND CLAY COUNTIES... At 457 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Eupora, or 19 miles east of Winona, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Eupora around 505 AM CDT. Mathiston and Sherwood around 515 AM CDT. Maben, Cumberland and Clarkson around 520 AM CDT. Pheba around 530 AM CDT. Montpelier around 535 AM CDT. Griffith around 540 AM CDT. Pala Alto around 545 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mantee and Walthall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central, north central and northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
